Drarin (Suzurin/?)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): CD/DVD List: Suzurin: Drarin (Suzurin/?)
By ChetFlavin on Friday, September 28, 2001 - 06:17 am:

Lif. 105
Pow. 120
Int. 135
Spd. 125
Def. 120
Charecteristics-Pride
Moves-Pokkorin, Aim Hit
Gotten off the dvd Interview with a Vampire (warner brothers lable)

By ChetFlavin on Wednesday, October 10, 2001 - 01:01 pm:

In Gamenow's review of MR3 it says Drarin can also be gotten off the dvd Batman(1989).

By John Hawley on Tuesday, February 19, 2002 - 01:41 pm:

DVD: Batman Widescreen side Produces Drarin

And the Standard side produces a Joker.
